DOC.brief_title: Internet-based Self-help Treatment Panic Disorder : Two Ways Complementary Psychological Support
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study compare two way administrate complementary psychological support ( schedule vs. non-scheduled ) online self-help program panic disorder . In order , investigator study : ) If difference intensity frequency symptom panic disorder . b ) If difference therapeutic adherence subject receive kind complementary support . c ) If time spend psychologist therapeutic intervention produce best result therapeutic adherence / symptom improvement . Treatment program Internet-based self-help program anxiety disorder `` FREE OF ANXIETY '' develop , base cognitive behavioral therapy . The program present interactive course , divide eight weekly modules.A number therapeutic component use : psychological education ( module 1-8 ) , behavioral analysis ( safety avoidance behavior ) ( module 2 ) , vivo interoceptive exposure ( module 2-8 ) , relaxation training diaphragmatic breathing ( module 1-4 ) , cognitive restructuring ( module 4-5 ) , mindfulness ( Module 6 ) communication training ( module 7 ) , problem solve Module 8 ) . The program also include message system therapist subject . Participants Procedure The participant recruit use google banner link search anxiety disorder . The individual redirect Web page contain information anxiety disorder aim study . Suicide risk ( score 3 15th item Web Screening Questionnaire ) establish exclusion criterion . The study approve ethic committee Autonomous University Barcelona . Applicants complete informed consent , demographic questionnaire screening questionnaire online . One week later psychologist train apply MINI International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( Sheehan , Lecrubier , Harnett-Sheehan , Janavs , Weiller , Bonora , et al. , 1997 ) assess presence current psychiatric diagnosis . Participants Panic Disorder complete battery self-reported measure order ass panic disorder , anxiety , depression symptom . After clinical evaluation , participant divide three group true random-number service . The data collect anonymized coded Seventy seven subject follow online self-help program 8 week ; 27 subject support therapist via phone require , 25 subject support therapist weekly 25 subject wait list control group . Participants complete self-reported measure end treatment , six month later . Statistical analyse The investigator study difference participant without Panic Disorder regard gender age , use Chi-square test Student t-test . The participant ' pretreatment posttreatment measure analyze analysis variance ( ANOVA ) repeat measure . These follow test Bonferroni-corrected p value . Effect size calculate within group , calculation base pooled standard deviation , Cohen 's d. All analyse conduct use SPSS version 22 Windows .
DOC.criteria: Meet Diagnostic Statistical Manual criterion panic disorder . Have suffer panic disorder least one year . Suffer panic disorder primary pathology . If participant take medication panic disorder / agoraphobia , dose stable three month start program . Obtain score 26 Beck Depression Inventory II Suffer another psychiatric illness require immediate attention . Risk suicide , indicate score 3 screen questionnaire . Being cognitive behavioral therapy .
